product_name: Beyerdynamic DT 1990 Pro Open Studio Headphone

Technical Specification.Input Jack: 3-pin XLR plug, 6.35 mm (1/4") stereo jack plug, 3 m straight cable & 5 m coiled cable

description.title: Beyerdynamic DT 1990 Pro Open Studio Headphone
description.details: The DT 1990 PRO are handcrafted in Germany. From the smart headband through to the aluminium end pieces, the new professional headphones are real head-turners due to their exceptionally meticulous craftsmanship with a real focus on quality and durability. Uncompromising benchmark-setting studio headphones for sophisticated listening, mixing and mastering. For decades now, professional users all around the world have placed their trust in beyerdynamic studio headphones. They have earned the trust and respect of music producers, sound technicians and broadcasters and have established themselves as a firm favourite in studios all over the world. Power and precision are critical requirements when it comes to sound reproduction. The efficiency of our latest Tesla driver technology is characterised emphatically by high resolution and high output power. Brilliant highs, a richly detailed midrange and precise bass combine to ensure a sublime sound quality that is second to none. Together with the open-back design, the high-resolution Tesla drivers of the beyerdynamic DT 1990 headphones ensure a wide, dynamic and extremely natural stereo image. Titanium-coated acoustic fabric and carefully selected precision-woven textiles round off the balanced sound quality of these dynamic studio headphones. Choose between a well-balanced sound or deliberately analytical sound tuning thanks to two sets of interchangeable velour ear pads. The open, circumaural design offers a natural and extremely spatial sound. The DT 1990 PRO Tesla headphones' optimized spatial sound reproduction makes them a reliable reference for mixing and mastering applications. The perfected design of the DT 1990 PRO combines innovation with decades of expertise in headphone technology. High-tech textiles and ear pads make the headphones exceptionally comfortable. They are so comfortable you will almost forget you are wearing them.

description.title: Jabra Evolve2 75 USB-A MS Teams Stereo Headset
description.details: The Jabra Evolve2 75 USB-A MS Teams Stereo Headset has replaced previous hybrid working standards. Industry-leading call quality thanks to top-notch audio engineering. With this intelligent headset, you can stay connected and productive from the first call of the day to the last train home. With an ergonomic earcup design, this headset invented a brand-new dual-foam technology. You will be comfortable from the first call to the last thanks to the re-engineered leatherette ear cushion design that allows for better airflow. We can provide exceptional noise isolation and the best all-day comfort by mixing firm foam for the outer with soft foam for the interior of the ear cushions. So that you may receive Active Noise-Cancellation (ANC) performance that is even greater in a headset that you can wear for whatever length you wish. The headset also offers MS Teams Certifications and other features like Busylight, Calls controls, Voice guiding, and Wireless range (ft): Up to 100 feet.

description.title: Best-in-class. Boom
description.details: The most recent Jabra Evolve2 75 USB-A MS Teams Stereo Headset offers professional-grade call performance that leads the industry, yet Evolve2 75 wins best-in-class. Additionally, this includes a redesigned microphone boom arm that is 33 percent shorter than the Evolve 75 and offers the industry-leading call performance for which Jabra headsets are known. It complies with Microsoft's Open Office criteria and is specially tuned for outstanding conversations in open-plan workplaces and other loud environments when the microphone boom arm is lowered in Performance Mode.

description.title: Concentration mode: activated
description.details: The headset has advanced active noise-cancellation technology (ANC). To safeguard your attention, it allowed the sophisticated feedforward and feedback dual hybrid ANC to work. From the train to the street, the cafe, the airport, and then back to the workplace. Anywhere you are, it makes it easier to focus.

description.title: Three advanced chipsets. Three times the power
description.details: This Jabra Evolve2 75's impressive capabilities are all supported by a sophisticated ecosystem comprised of three potent digital chipsets. These combine to make the headset quicker, more powerful, and smarter than before.

description.title: Stay flexible. Stay connected
description.details:
If you are on a call, you may still use this headset because it has excellent call performance within a 30-meter wireless range. You may connect to both your smartphone and laptop. so that you may travel away from your workstation without losing connection.

The headset is also featured with Busylight, Calls controls, Voice guidance, Wireless range (ft): Up to 100 feet, and also it has MS Teams Certifications. This Latest Jabra Evolve2 75 USB-A MS Teams Stereo Headset has 02 years warranty.

product_name: Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone

description.title: Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone
description.details: The Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone is a premium RGB gaming headset with high definition sound, simulated 7.1 surround sound, and AI noise cancellation for a truly immersive gaming experience. It has a high-fidelity ESS 9280 Quad DACTM and 50 mm ASUS Precision speakers for strong bass and realistic sound quality. It also includes ROG AI Beamforming Microphones with AI Noise Cancelation to filter out background noise and improve voice quality. To balance the gameplay audio and in-game dialogue, you may quickly modify the game chat volume. Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone comes with a variety of customization choices, pre-set light effects, and multi-color RGB lighting with over 16.8 million colors to fit your style and mood. It also offers a lightweight and comfy design with ergonomic ear cushions that fit securely on your ears. The 3.5 mm, USB-C ®, and USB-A ports on the Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone make it compatible with PCs, Macs, PlayStation®, Nintendo SwitchTM, Xbox, and mobile devices. The Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone will give you an excellent and immersive gaming experience whether you are playing, streaming, or listening to music.

description.title: Virtual 7.1 Surround Sound with Ai Noise Cancelation
description.details: The simulated 7.1 surround sound increases your game immersion by providing realistic and spatial sound effects. With the hi-fi ESS 9280 Quad DACTM and 50 mm ASUS Essence drivers, you can enjoy rich and detailed sound quality that delivers strong bass and immersive true-to-life sound. Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone With the ROG AI Beamforming Microphones with AI Noise Cancelation, you can communicate clearly and confidently by filtering out background noise and improving your voice quality.

description.title: Various Customization And Comfortability
description.details: Customize your gaming style and mood with the different customization choices, pre-set light effects, and multi-color RGB lighting with over 16.8 million colors. Enjoy the comfort and ease of the pleasant and lightweight design with ergonomic ear cushions that fit securely on your ears.

description.title: Compatibility
description.details: Asus ROG Fusion II 500 Wired Over-Ear Gaming Headphone Connect to PCs, Macs, PlayStation®, Nintendo SwitchTM, Xbox, and mobile devices through the 3.5 mm, USB-C ®, and USB-A ports.

description.title: RODE NTH-100M Professional Over-ear Headset
description.details: The RODE NTH-100M is a professional over-ear headset that combines exceptional audio performance with a broadcast-grade headset microphone. The NTH-100M offers flawless audio and crystal-clear voice capture in an incredibly cozy and fashionable package, making it ideal for anyone working in the media or broadcast industry, podcasting, streaming, gaming, or working from home or the office.

description.title: Hear and Be Heard With Incredible Audio
description.details: The RODE NTH-100M reproduces sound with incredibly accurate frequency response, little distortion, and great detail thanks to custom-matched drivers and meticulously engineered acoustics. Whether you're listening to music, playing a game, or taking part in a business conference call, you can rely on the audio to be accurately reproduced in every detail. The broadcast-grade microphone is placed in the best possible way to capture crystal-clear voice in any setting while also providing excellent speech intelligibility and plosive rejection.

description.title: Made for Maximum Comfort
description.details: The RODE NTH-100M Professional Over-ear Headset is ergonomically designed for your comfort. The Alcantara earcup and headband cushions are luxuriously soft and breathable, allowing you to wear the headset for extended periods of time without discomfort. CoolTech gel layer within the earcups actively dissipates heat, keeping your head and ears cool and reducing wearing fatigue. The earcups' distinctive ergonomic design, combined with memory foam, provides a custom-fit feel for any head size or shape, even if you wear glasses. The FitLok locking system on the fully adjustable headband ensures a secure and precise fit every time you put on the headset.

description.title: Professional Style for Every Setting
description.details: The NTH-100M headset exudes professionalism in any setting thanks to its sleek design and high-quality finishes. The low-profile headset microphone is unobtrusive and will not obscure your view on camera, ensuring a clean and professional appearance. The NTH-100M keeps the focus on your voice without any visual distractions while streaming, participating in video conferences, or recording content.

description.title: Built to Last
description.details: The RODE NTH-100M is designed to withstand the rigors of daily use. RODE's state-of-the-art facilities in Sydney, Australia, manufacture each component with high-quality materials. The Alcantara cushions and locking cable connectors are extremely long-lasting, and the spring steel headband has a scratch-resistant coating. The modular design of the headset allows for simple replacement of cushions, cables, and the microphone, ensuring maximum longevity.
